review: It was just what I needed
author: Jose De Santiago

review: its a good tool to have for watching streaming shows and movies IF you already have accounts with certain networks. Does not work in hotels due to proxy and web portals.
author: David Gomez

review: Life is so much better with Chromecast.
author: zach

review: This was more complicated to set up than I was led to believe (b/c a friend had no problem).  For me, I had to figure out the exact type of router I had, call the company who sold the router, and change some configurations.
author: Jordana

review: Was never able to get Chromecast to cast Netflix movies to my TV from 5' away???
author: Elmer Bishop

review: SHHHHWeet! I love this thing! no cables to deal with :).  I use two apps mainly which are Netflix and BubbleUPNP.  BubbleUPNP lets you play all your video's you have stored on a computer or NAS.  It plays MP4/M4V without issue (which is the standard these days). My wife is Chinese so I wish they would have more Chinese programming out there.  More apps are always arriving so I'm sure some will pop up one day.
author: Amazon Customer
